spanGrp.span: Me, I will tell my story as I am with Richard.
anin gidabalol hadisedeny aa gandaw richad
ànín gìdàbàlól hàdísédény àà gàndàw rìchàd
mimi nitazungumza hadithi yangu nikiwa na richard
Me, in the old days, when I married
When I arrived I came with a grinding stone
iyahit qared buneed gahit aa gwand laqaneda
íyáhìt qàréd bùnééd gàhít àà gwànd làqànédà
nilipofika kwa watu nilifika kukuwa na jiwe la kusaga
There were cooking pots and water pots, and they used them to cook, and they cooked with a wood stove, that is with the mafiga stones
gwand safuriajeg gwand dawunadka aa gewolid gewolid gishadka
gwànd sàfùrìajég gwànd dàwùnàdkà àà géwòlíd géwòlíd gìshàdka
kuna masufuria na kuna vyungu na wanaitumia kwa kupika na wanapika kwa jiko la kuni yaani mafiga
And we lived in grass houses
na sisi tunaishi nyumba za nyasi
And when you go to sleep
You arrive and sweep your area and prepare your skin mat and you sleep.
giyit aa gubus bus darortang'w aa gisin mundang'w aa gilill
'gìyít àà gúbús bús dàròrtàng''w àà gísín múndàng''w àà gìlíll'
ukifika unaifagia sehemu pako na unatengeneza ngozi yako ya kulala na unalala
It's morning and you go to fetch firewood and this firewood is carried on the back
gamuch qed aa giwun qwend qweng geyinaj badawuk
gàmúch qéd àà gíwún qwénd qwéng géyínàj bàdàwúk
inakucha tu na unaenda kutafuta kuni na kuni hiyo inabebwa kwa mgongo
And it is put on the head
And we go to the river
